A0: Minister Sadiq bin Abdelkarim Al - Shehabi
RelatedSentence: Geneva , May19 ( BNA ) Health Minister Sadiq bin Abdelkarim Al - Shehabi is leading Bahrain 's delegation to the 67th annual meeting of the World Health Organisation ( WHO ) , which opened today and will run until May26 .
The delegation will attend the meetings of the Arab and GCC and No - aligned Movement ( NAM ) health ministers on the sidelines of the WHO annual session .
